Hi, I’m Ben!

I'M A WEB DEVELOPER & PROJECT MANAGER WITH EXPERIENCE IN ALL THINGS WEB AND DIGITAL.

Experience

Currently, I’m working for DreamBox Learning as their Website Marketing Manager.

Previously I spent 2+ years working at a FinTech startup called Meed Banking Club where I did a little bit of everything, but primarily focused on managing our design and web workflows.

Prior to that I spent 2+ years at Coalition Technologies, a digital marketing agency in Los Angeles, where I managed 50+ web development projects and 10+ SE0/PPC campaigns.

If you'd like to contact me, please do so via LinkedIn.
